title: Check Mark

adjectives: This emoji is typically seen as correct or successful.
verbs: It can be used to indicate something is confirmed or completed.
nouns: It represents a symbol of approval or a verified item.

description: A bold, green checkmark, signifying correctness, success, approval, or completion. It's a universally understood symbol of affirmation.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the check mark emoji is a bold, vibrant green stroke with a distinctively rounded tip and a satisfying, slightly curved tail. Its glossy 3D shading makes it pop off the screen, exuding confidence and definitive affirmation. This emoji is universally recognized for confirming tasks, approving choices, or signifying completion with a clear and positive visual cue.
